summary: LETTER FROM CONGRESSMAN ADAM SMITH REGARDING HIS CONSTITUENT  LAWRENCE F CROSTIC (WA)  WHO SUBMITTED A SAFETY COMPLAINT TO NHTSA CONCERNING A 2001 AIRSTREAM MOTOR HOME THAT WAS OVERLOADED ON THE FRONT STEERING AXLE BY 700#+, AND DID NOT FEEL SAFE IN VEHICLE. REPLY TO WASHINGTON OFFICE. DOT/#2003-4144. THUS FAR, THERE WAS NO ANSWER FROM NHTSA. NHTSA INDICATED THAT MR. CROSTIC'S LETTER, DATED SEPTEMBER 25, 2002, WAS NOT RECEIVED BY THE AGENCY UNTIL FEBRUARY 19, 2003. *AK           *JB
